code: import React from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{profileIcon,savedIcon,settingsIcon,switchAccountIcon}from'./SvgIcons';import{logoutUser}from'../../actions/userAction';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{toast}from"react-toastify";import{ClickAwayListener}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProfileDetails=function ProfileDetails(_ref){var setProfileToggle=_ref.setProfileToggle;var dispatch=useDispatch();var navigate=useNavigate();var _useSelector=useSelector(function(state){return state.user;}),user=_useSelector.user;var tabs=[{title:"Profile",icon:profileIcon,redirect:"/".concat(user.username)},{title:"Saved",icon:savedIcon,redirect:"/".concat(user.username)},{title:"Settings",icon:settingsIcon,redirect:"/accounts/edit"},{title:"Switch Account",icon:switchAccountIcon,redirect:"/"}];var handleLogout=function handleLogout(){dispatch(logoutUser());navigate("/login");toast.success("Logout Successfully");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClickAwayListener,{onClickAway:function onClickAway(){return setProfileToggle(false);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"absolute w-56 bg-white rounded  drop-shadow top-14 right-0 md:right-72 md:top-14 border",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute right-5 -top-2 rotate-45 h-4 w-4 bg-white rounded-sm border-l border-t"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col w-full overflow-hidden",children:[tabs.map(function(el,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:el.redirect,className:"flex items-center gap-3 p-2.5 text-sm pl-4 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50",children:[el.icon,el.title]},i);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"flex rounded-b border-t-2 items-center gap-3 p-2.5 text-sm pl-4 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50",children:"Logout"})]})]})});};export default ProfileDetails;
